description: Return of Double Dragon features several significant differences from Super Double Dragon: the title theme and most of the background music were shuffled around (e.g. the Mission 1 theme from Super Double Dragon is played during Mission 4 in Return of Double Dragon) and the player can perform certain actions which cannot be done in Super Double Dragon (such as retrieving a boomerang after throwing it or hitting an opponent more than once successively with the hurricane kick). The enemy placement is also different in both versions and weapons such as knives and incendiary bombs do less damage in Return of Double Dragon. Enemies can duck end combo blows, thus preventing the player from finishing their combos. The final Mission also features two additional levels before the final battle. An Option Mode is included in Return of Double Dragon as well, allowing players to adjust the game's difficulty level, as well as listen to the game's music and sound effects.

name: Momo
description:
Momo is a horror game based on the history of the whatssap user "momo", in the game, you will be a guy that contacts momo by whatsapp, and now he will be pursued by the monster of momo.

You will have to complete some tasks before get rescued, like search things, hide, close doors, etc.

The objetive is to survive until the timer reachs 00:00 then, the police will arrive and you would able to escape.

name: No Longer Home: Friary Road
description: Bo and Ao are the last ones left after a barbecue and find themselves stargazing.

name: Swooning Over Stans
description:
Ever watch Gravity Falls and think, man, that Stan sure is hot? Well, indulge that thought by playing this Grunkle Dating Sim, a Gravity Falls fangame!

A summer road trip leads to an unexpected pause in Gravity Falls. Can you capture the heart of one of the Mystery Shack’s most eligible bachelors? Or will you leave empty-handed?

name: Jacks or Better: Video Poker
description:
Enjoy the Casino Experience!

* Simple and clean design.
* Fast and easy game play.
* Gamble your winnings.
* View statistics.
* Climb the Leaderboard and earn bragging rights.

name: Pro Office Calculator
description: Sin descripción

name: Endless Fables Collection
description: Artifex Mundi Hidden Object Games Bundle

name: Project Highrise: Brilliant Berlin
description: In Brilliant Berlin, you’ll be challenged to adapt and keep up with the diverse needs of this thriving global city. To succeed in Berlin, you will need to build towers brimming with art, amenities, and elegance to lure in discerning tenants.

name: Holonglide
description:
Holonglide is Casual yet Challenging Platformer. The aim of Holonglide is to test the player's problem solving skills, muscle memory and finger dexterity.
Featuring over 90 levels and an advanced difficulty mode.

name: Macroboy Y
description:
Macroboy Y is a fast multiplayer platform and fighting game. Fights take place in dangerous, often vertical, arenas.
You will have to move quickly and nimbly to be the last one alive.

name: Detector Island: A Metal Detecting Game
description: You walk around on an island digging up random bits of metal objects. Most of the time you'll find trash, but the most rewarding feeling is when you find treasure. These objects earn a varying number of points, depending on what the object comes out as, which you can use to buy skins or upgrades for your detector. Listen to calming music as you take in the island's unique scenery. What can you dig up?

name: Pure Electric Love "Look at my eyes!" Moe Yamauchi
description: Pure / Electric Love "Look at my eyes!" - Moe Yamauchi - is a dating simulator where you chat as if you were on a smartphone. Reply to questions from your partner, receive images/videos and try to keep the conversation going!

name: Lost Phone Stories
description: The Lost Phone games are about exploring the intimacy of an unknown person whose phone you've found.

name: ACA Neo Geo: League Bowling
description: League Bowling is a bowling game released by SNK in 1990. You are able to select your dominant arm and ball weight, using precise controls to play just like real bowling! Choose from one of three modes, REGULATION, FLASH, and STRIKE 90.

name: Isle of Skye
description: Five clans are fighting to rule over the Isle of Skye. Only the chieftain who develops the best clan territory and trades wisely will be king!

name: Mercs
description: Assemble a team of mercenaries and challenge the computer or another player in a quick turn-based battle. Unlock new mercs, find the best skill combos, and watch your adorable tiny soldiers blow themselves up in a variety of hex-mapped, low-poly environments.

name: Dead Mayhem
description:
One day the world suddenly changed due to an outbreak of the zombie virus! 
Build a safe area and teach yourself how to survive!

name: Because We're Here: Mohnblume und Blauerose
description: Stagger through the First Lassallian War and find love amongst doomed youth. 'Because We're Here' is a plot-driven otome visual novel in an unforgiving WW1-inspired setting. Don't worry - it'll all be over by Christmas.

name: Die in the Dark
description: Trapped in the subway with zombies, vicious dogs, and a slew of other monsters. Can you escape the puzzles and survive the monsters of Plum Island?

name: The Chronicles of Noah's Ark
description: One of the most amazing stories in the history of mankind is presented once again in The Chronicles of Noah's Ark. Step into Noah's shoes and build the ark in this touching story of faith, family, and the future.

name: Memory Trainer
description: A beautiful game for practice of memory. Open the cards and remember their location to find a pair of the same and remove them from the Board.

name: Project 59
description: You joined a secret agency. Someone is ordering you to carry out covert operations. There are advanced equipment and weapons at your disposal. You have to eliminate mutant creatures as you go through your mission objectives. But you realize things are not as they seem. There is something wrong in the system.

name: 1 Hit Kill
description:
The bad guys take one hit... So do you!
This 80's-style Top-Down Shooter tests your patience!

name: Endless Fables 3: Dark Moor
description: During her new adventure, Pamela Cavendish goes to a misty and mysterious Scotland where a seemingly innocent landscape of moor quickly reveals its dark nature. Spectre from the past and ghostly sounds will force her to follow the amazing legend of the Red Moon.

name: Starship Avenger: Operation Take Back Earth
description:
Starship Avenger is a defense shooter action game.

Blast off the weapons installed on Avenger to defeat the enemies who come to destroy mankind’s ultimate weapon! Don’t let them cross the Dead Line or they’ll cause damage to Thor’s Hammer!

Charge your energy gauge by defeating enemies and release the limiter to blast a full-scale attack to destroy them all at once! The energy gauge can be used to create a temporarily barrier surrounding Avenger! Use your gauge wisely depending on the situation to get ahead!

Power up the battleship and try to attain a perfect shield and kill ratio in all stages! There are three different difficulties to choose from, making it enjoyable for beginners and advanced players of defense action games!

name: Blacksmith: Dark Times
description: Take on the role of blacksmith in the castle, create weapons and sell it to soldiers, or the army of darkness will capture the last castle, which the darkness has not yet found.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum 'n' Fun!
description: Enjoy the cult classic arcade rhythm game from Japan in the comfort of your own home! Play to the beat using your own drum with a wide variety of new songs and challenge your friends to prove who has the best taiko skills. Use motion controls to enjoy Taiko like never before! Unlock beloved characters to help you on your journey to become a legendary taiko drummer! Utilize the interactive features of the Nintendo Switch to connect, share, and play with family and friends.

name: The Mystery of Happyville
description: When the sleepy little town of Happyville suddenly cuts off contact with the outside world, nobody could have predicted the sinister happenings that were occurring far away from civilization's prying eye...

name: Unnatural
description: Monsters are real. Join the Supernatural Response Team, an organization formed in direct response to the first documented case showing the existence of the darker side of humanity...

name: Radiis
description: Radiis is a turn based strategy game without any moving units, only buildings. Place your buildings wisely and be the first player to conquer the land.

name: The Brink
description: Sin descripción

name: Masked Forces 3
description: Welcome to Masked Forces 3, the ultimate FPS simulation! This is a game where you can test and improve your shooting capabilities against multiple game modes.

name: The Harbinger's Head
description: The Harbinger's Head is a fantastic 46,000 word interactive horror novel by Kim Berkley, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based - without graphics or sound effects - and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

name: Pool Panic
description: Pool Panic is the world’s least realistic pool simulator. Play as a mischievous, and dare we say, oblivious cue ball in a giant game of pool that sprawls across a colorful cartoon overworld with more than 100 levels. Explore jungles, deserts, carnivals, cities and more while knocking around a peculiar cast of billiard balls, most of which won’t appreciate being pocketed.

name: Kentucky Dash
description: Kentucky Dash is an endless autorunner where you race to see who can get the furthest.

name: Impulsion
description: Impulsion is a fast-paced first-person platformer designed to play with your nerves and reflexes! Make your way through 25 levels of increasing difficulty by manipulating physics to your advantage, shooting force fields to slow down or speed yourself up and the environment!

name: Closed Nightmare
description: A live action adventure horror game from Nippon Ichi Software.

name: Prototype Mansion - Used No Cover
description: "PROTOTYPE MANSION - USED NO COVER" is the first chapter in an original anthology of oldschool, 32-bit horror stories.

name: Detective Case and Clown Bot in: The Express Killer
description: Someone has been killing passengers on the express train from Lisbon to Porto, every single day since Tuesday! Someone needs to stop the killer! Detective Case and Clown Bot are back and… is that a kid in the logo?

name: Mechanism
description: Mechanism — an adventure game about a lonely robot. Dive into a depressive steampunk world which has been infected with a strange disease called "Phlegm".

name: Qrth-Phyl
description: Arcade documentary of maze/dot/snake mechanic within changing dimensions, axis locks and the corruption of the system. Collect, grow, avoid your past, find new space, wake up...

name: The Miskatonic
description: Explore the writhing depths of Miskatonic University as new faculty member, Charlotte LeStrange and meet the otherwordly yet charmingly hilarious residents of this place while investigating the innate strangeness and oddities of this mysterious university.

name: KO Mech
description: A small mech with a heart of gold embarks on a quest to punch everyone to death.

name: Sausage Sports Club
description: Sausage Sports Club is a sausage-themed physics game about adorable, long-necked animals competing on a reality sports TV show!

name: Out of the Box
description:
You are Warren Baker, the new bouncer in "The Box", the most exclusive club in town.
You will have to interact with several different types of customers. Some of them match the rules to get in, and some of them don't, it's your job to choose who may come in.
Throughout many different days, Warren will have to make some decissions that will affect his life in many different ways.

name: Tanzia
description: An Adventure RPG in comic book style with an island setting of treasure chests and waterfalls, Tanzia combines elements of favorite classic RPGs in an open 3D world of magic and monsters.

name: Guts and Glory
description: Guts and Glory is a game about racing to the finish line while everything tries to kill you and you laugh about it.

name: Mini TD 2: Relax Tower Defense
description: Sin descripción

name: Slenderman vs. Freddy the Fazbear
description: Urban Legends clash! Fight as your favorite Fear Character.

name: Pokémon Jade
description:
The Ario Region is inhabited only by Pokemon native to its land, based off the beautiful Australia. In this tropical region you'll find tons of new faces to bond with! The number is subject to change, could be more or less.
8 Gyms, Elite Four and a Champion - This game follows the traditional system, but don't fret, each gym leader will come with interesting puzzles and challenges galore!
Completely Original Region - Ario is like no other region in the original Pokemon games. It features multiple climates and atmospheres that'll keep gameplay feeling fresh.

name: Expiate
description:
Expiate follows the dreams of Corbin, who accesses his subconscious by dozing off to the static sound and visuals of his television screen. It gets predictably surreal from there. You can choose to lead him to the darkest pits of his mind... or just break a bunch of stuff with a metal baseball bat. Either way, something or someone's gonna get beaten up.

Expiate is a mostly traditional Yume Nikki fangame, with some slight alterations to the formula. Effects are a part of the game, but collecting them is not your main focus. Instead, use effects and explore to look for strange objects located around the dreamworld. Gather these items in order to progress.

name: Rolly
description: Jump, Roll, Hop and Dive your way through sharp caves to rescue your friends.

name: Biok
description:
BIOK is pure strategy and intuition. A board game for the ingenious and the acute minds.
Lead the creatures on the playing field to capture monsters and all kinds of items. Watch the monsters' eyes and guide them to their preys.
There are multiple solutions in each level, but the best strategists will strive for the maximum, with great skill and a pinch of logic.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 32 - Teen Titans: The Judas Contract
description: The Teen Titans are back and recruiting new heroes to join their ranks! Head to Titans Tower and test your skills alongside fellow recruits Damian Wayne and Terra. We hope you have what it takes, because after an attack on the Tower, all of the Teen Titans will go missing! Can you save them?

name: Boukensha Guild he Youkoso!
description: Sin descripción

name: My Little Pony: Pocket Ponies
description: In this ridiculously fun arcade game, join Twilight Sparkle and your favorite My Little Pony characters at the School of Friendship! As a new student, you are swept away in the first, awesome Pocket Pony Championship! Face-off against masters, students and teachers in thrilling arcade challenges using the unique Pocket Ponies figurines. Collect them all to make your perfect team!

name: The Tower
description: A game about trans women, tarot, therapy, and alien abduction.

name: Giant's Chalice
description: Explore and battle monsters in a magical world

name: Package Man
description: Paper Boy has graduated from handing out newspapers to delivering Packages. Get a chance to work for the best Delivery Company in the World!

name: Spider Ponds
description: A game about being a spider. Weave a web, catch prey, and discover the forest's secrets. Move along webs, sprouts, and trees. Eat flies to replenish your stamina, and follow a mysterious figure to see the end.

name: Destiny Knights
description:
Enter a world in turmoil as ancient grudges threaten to destroy civilizations.
Take to the skies and follow a group of young adventurers as they travel to unlock ancient mysteries and stop an all-out war in this high-octane action RPG.

name: Animal Rivals: Nintendo Switch Edition
description: Animal Rivals is a crazy party game for up to 4 players. Different characters, game modes, lots of stages and tons of fun. Many unlockables like costumes and skins.

name: PuppetShow: Destiny Undone - Collector's Edition
description: A wonderful story of the citizens of Joyville. Can you change their destiny? You will see – nothing is impossible.

name: Type Defense
description: Write to fight! Desert bandits are coming, defend your castle! Everyone knows typing is the best way to use a ballista!

name: Forgotten World
description:
A classic old style game, a strategic turn combat system with incredible magic and a great story! This is Forgotten World! 
A bounty reward where you have to find these criminals and get something uselfull for your journey. 
A lot of different demons waits you to reclaim the power of your swords, are you ready to stop them? 
A world full of humans and drydars where magic is everywhere!

name: Teen Titans Go! Figure
description: Teen Titans GO! Figure is a three-on-three-based combat game. You will face off against the bad guys with your team of heroes, progressing through the story of the game in a bid to solve a mystery and save the Teen Titans. You can customise your team both cosmetically and by levelling them up to make them more powerful. The game features a full story mode which you can play through as any of the Teen Titans. You can explore Gotham City and Metropolis as well as the Teen Titans home of Jump City.

name: Pido1
description: Pido1 is a platformer in which you will have to solve logical tasks for successfully passing the levels.

name: Viki Spotter: Camping
description: An exciting puzzle game about finding differences. Compare the pictures and try to find everything that they differ from each other.

name: NightmareBullet
description: "Nightmare Bullet" is a top-down shooting game. You control a hero trapped in a world where nightmares have come true. Where's the escape? Various enemies stand in the way of the hero. Defeat them with the hero's gun and bombs!

name: ZYX Story
description:
Try to met the wise man in this epic adventure and survive in this platform/puzzle game.
Avoid death by enemies and lasers with your beautiful rifle.
Written by your beautiful rifle ;)

name: Aeroplanoui
description: Take to the skies to battle enemy spaceships, tanks, drones, UFO and eventually die.

name: TimeCluster
description: Protect the past, save the future.TimeCluster is a first person VR shooter. In each mission you are sent back in time to protect villagers in a medieval town where the Order of the Grand Eulidians is born. In the future they govern over the known galaxy. An alien race is bent on preventing their creation.

name: Koikoi
description:
This boy is not alone.
Because you are with him!

name: A Rite from the Stars
description: A Rite from the Stars is a game about overcoming and magic. A 3D Graphic Adventure that takes pointing and clicking to a paradisiacal yet dangerous setting. A dynamic world where pixel hunts, pointless long walks or even inventories are nowhere to be found. The game also offers the freedom to play each path in the order desired by the player.

name: Dead by Death
description: Dead by Death is a retro style platformer. The hero will explore dungeons where are full of traps and find out hidden secrets. To defeat monsters till you die or live for glory.

name: Ninja SpeedRush
description: Simple arcade game with intuitive gameplay.

name: Night of the Shrub Part 2
description: Night of the Shrub Part 2 is a short, visual novel, with a single storyline rife with odd happenings - The continuing adventures of Shrub and his friends as they wind their way through the creepy Old Twermbly Place.

name: Bad Day
description: Bad Day - Side scrolling shooter about four strangers who have to pass a dangerous path together to survive ...

name: Achaem
description: Achaem is a roguelike with an infinite and destructible world, customisable character, insane combat, and progression system!

name: One Day for Revenge
description: One Day for Revenge - bloody indie shooter with a view from above.A beautiful morning, fresh air, a trip to the maternity home, it would seem, did not foretell any ills. But fate has its own plans.

name: Chimera of Tactics 2
description: This is an innovative fast-paced third-person shooter game.

name: Project Myriad
description: Project Myriad is a tower defense strategy game. You place symbols on a map of hexagon tiles that will activate defense towers. These towers will attack waves of enemies. The goal is clear as many waves as possible. Once placed you can upgrade towers to provide more damage.

name: The Tower of Beatrice
description: This is the Adventure / Room Escape game about an unlucky Thief, who stole a quite babbling book.

name: Gorn
description:
GORN is a ludicrously violent VR gladiator simulator, made by Free Lives, the developers of Broforce and Genital Jousting.

Featuring a unique, fully physics driven combat engine, GORN combatants will be able to creatively execute their most violent gladiatorial fantasies in virtual reality. Savagely strike down an infinite supply of poorly-animated opponents with all manner of weapons – from swords, maces, and bows to nunchuks, throwing knives, massive two-handed warhammers or even your blood-soaked bare hands. The only limits to the carnage are your imagination and decency, in the most brutal and savage VR face-smashing game ever produced by man.

name: Warlocks 2: God Slayers
description: Warlocks 2: God Slayers is a humorous pixel-art metroidvania. Challenge the vile gods and dethrone them in this action-packed hack n' slash experience with wizards and meteor showers.

name: Let's Sing 2018: Chart Hits Song Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Let's Sing 2018: Best of 80's Song Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Crossout: Corrida Pack
description: This pack includes: Unique armored car: Corrida; Weapons: Cricket 1M Unique cabin Torero Unique hero portrait: Jose Ortega; Unique decor: Muleta Wing, Corno Destro, Corno Sinistro; Unique sticker: Mad bull; Unique paint can: El Dorado; Increases the maximum number of parts used to 55;1500 in-game coins.

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer Reloaded: Elegance Edition
description: This bundle includes Genso Wanderer -Reloaded- and all additional DLC.

name: Ala Mobile GP
description:
Formation lap is almost over, as you push gently on the throttle and brutally steer one last time from left to right, trying to maintain a high temperature on your wheels. You know it's the key to get through the first corner as fast as you can. Probably it will allow you to make a good start and overtake the two cars in front of you. They already reached their starting spots.
It's time to lift up gas pedal and focus on that yellow line on your grid spot. While gently applying pressure on the brake pedal, you try to gain every millimeter the regulation permits, and perfectly line up your front wing with the white line defining your starting position.
Now you are pushing the paddles on the bottom part of your steering wheel, disengaging the clutch. Shift from 2nd to 1st gear. The car is still.
First red light of the traffic light turns on. You did this already, you know how to do it. Your right foot pushes gently gas pedal.
Second red light is on, rpm hits the limiter.
Third red light is on. The engine now howles loud, while you try to find the right rpms for a perfect start.
Four red light is on. The heat distortion waves of the cars in front of you suggest all drivers are ready for the fight.
Fifth red light is on. A fast glance to the steering wheel display. Everything is ok.
Lights are out...

name: Sonic Mania: Encore
description: Get the Encore Pack to experience the all-new Encore Mode, two new playable characters Mighty and Ray, and four player Competition Mode.

name: Let's Sing 2018: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: 1337D00m
description: 1337d00m is a hacker's version of the original DOOM.

name: Fairy Knights
description: An RPG with unique characters and original battling system! An RPG that focuses on the story of the little heroes . Feel the bliss at the end of the journey.

name: KleptoDogs
description:
From the makers of KleptoCats and for the livelihood of dog lovers everywhere, it's... KLEPTODOGS!!!

That’s right! GemDog returns home from his adventures with the KleptoCats in order to lead other outrageously cute pups in their quest to fill rooms with the strangest of things.

Unlock all the different breeds: pug, corgi, beagle, chihuahua, some sort of weird alien dog that shouldn't be that shade of radioactive green, etc. The list goes on...

Feed them, play with them and even dress them in the cutest clothes. You’ll have a blast hanging out with these puppy pals!!!

name: Motorsport Manager Mobile 3
description:
Motorsport Manager Mobile 3 is the ultimate race team strategy game.

Build up your very own motorsport team from scratch, making every big decision. Hire the drivers, assemble the team, develop your car and mastermind your way to glory.

name: ICP: The Gathering
description:
You're in charge of launching The Gathering, the biggest festival of the year!
Plan the Gathering and launch your own festival!
Nearly every aspect of the Gathering is at your fingertips.

name: Cursed Queen : Wicked Witch
description: Cursed Queen : Wicked Witch is a text-based game released on 2018 on PC. Two short stories written in Twine. The tales of Denis, Jesabel, the Dark Fairies and Shirina.

name: Almost Alive
description: Almost Alive is redefining the role playing tactical games with an awesome real time combat system in a mad hand drawn post apocalyptic world that features character mental sanity as one of the core elements of a game with a non linear story.

name: Roman the Worm
description: Roman the Worm is a fun and tricky 2D Jump 'n' Run that everyone can enjoy. Try to dodge obstacles by jumping, running or placing boxes. Your goal is to collect all 10 hidden diamonds to enter the next level and complete the game.

name: The Red Moon
description: Trapped in a past mistake made in their younger days, You and your fellow party members must avenge the destroyed town of Inishigari and save the newly founded village of Mizunara, which has had reported sites of The Red Moon, meaning total destruction. How will you stop the cursed Red Moon?

name: VR Ground: Crazy Farm
description: 'VR Ground: Crazy Farm' is a party game based on a clash between a farmer and animals who are stealing his apples. Farmer who is using VR and animals who are using smart device can choose one of 3 game modes to play and enjoy together.

name: Adventure Hero
description: Run and collect coins and power-up to fight with bosses in fantastic worlds.

name: Envoy of Nezphere
description: A virtual-reality open-source rhythm game, Envoy of Nezphere welcomes everyone to feel the flow of the music by chopping the boxes alone the right direction.

name: DayD: Through Time
description: Want a dinosaur farm? We’ll give you a time machine and a park to restore! Journey into the past and deal with the villain!

name: Intelligence: Dinosaurs
description: Is a puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with dinosaurs) in such a way - that the picture was like the original image. Move the tiles of the puzzle wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of images

name: Horse Farm
description: Create the ranch of your dreams, with cute horses, diverse buildings, amazing features and captivating quests. Download Horse Farm now and take care of your horses!

name: Gene Rain
description: Gene Rain is a next-gen 3D third person shooter game. The story is set in a futuristic world, with a linear narrative structure, and uses shocking visual effects to present a brand new world for the players ' enjoyment.

name: Vinhomes Metropolis VR Interior
description: This is an experience where we expect you to spend about 5 minutes. Enjoy walking around and interacting with some parts of it just like you were there.

name: Reveal
description: Reveal is a first-person puzzle game with an intriguing story. While trying to pass the trials as a God, you also try to figure out why you don't remember anything.

name: Summer: Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Colorful and bright Summer: Jigsaw Puzzles will strike your imagination in assorted piece counts, shapes and levels of difficulty. Dozens of Summer Jigsaw Puzzles to suit any puzzler. Whether you love puzzles with beaches, nostalgic scenes and family gatherings, great vacation destinations or hometown scenes.

name: Another Otter
description: Jump, jump, jump, swim, swim, swim and help this otter to recover all the trophies that looked so good in his trophy case.

name: EreaDrone Simulator
description: The most realistic FPV simulator of the market ! Let's pilot a virtual immersive drone and race with many other players !

name: Trago
description: Trago tells the story of Juca, a regular guy that goes everyday at the same hour to this low budget bar called Trago.

name: Shadowlings
description: Shadowlings - is a slaughter to heavy metal in decorations of Medieval Japan.Hardcore battles, in which everything depends on your skill, ancient ninja's martial arts, sharp swords, strong spears and mysterious Shadow Magic.

name: Hard Helmets
description: Hard Helmets is a 2D real time strategy game where you can face other players in amazing battles through the use of world war II inspired characters that will reinforce your command with attack and defense strategies by using war bonds during every battle. Will you be able to deploy the perfect strategy to capture enemy facilities?

name: Paper Dungeons Crawler
description:
True turn by turn classic 16 bits Roguelike with a unique specialization system.
Explore the mysterious Dungeons of Cyndaria and an extensive lore to unearth. A plethora of creatures and magical items are waiting for you to step into ever-changing dungeons, with diverse biomes and challenges.

name: Sonic Mania Plus
description:
Sonic Mania Plus is an updated version of Sonic Mania that includes the Encore DLC. Digital versions of Sonic Mania on all platforms can be upgraded to Sonic Mania Plus by purchasing the Encore DLC separately.

Plus is also available as a physical release and marks the first time any version of Sonic Mania was available on physical media. Released for Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and Switch, in addition to including the complete version of Sonic Mania Plus on a disc/cartridge it also comes packaged with a reversible cover with alternate box art, an art book and a holographic outer sleeve.

name: Naked Sun
description: In the year 2232, World War IV is coming to an end. Humans are fighting a losing battle against aggressive machines. The only way to survive is to attack. Tomorrow morning, you will intercept a cargo train bound for the global capital, Mexico City, and ride it deep inside the enemy territory.

name: Far Cry 5: Lost on Mars
description: Lost on Mars transports the franchise’s insanity from Hope County to the red planet as Nick Rye is teleported to a hostile planet to help his buddy Hurk thwart an alien invasion of Earth. This adventure gives players a new arsenal of alien weaponry, including the Blaster of Disaster, Hellfire and Morphinator, while also introducing a new traversal tool with Space Jets. Humankind’s future is in the hands of the game’s most notorious guns-for-hire. Time to squash some bugs!

name: Mind Over Mushroom
description: Mind Over Mushroom is a turn-based, tactical strategy game featuring a free-form movement system and over a dozen unlockable character types. Fight your way through 25+ challenging battles set in a variety of diverse locations.

name: Adventure Time: Pirates of the Enchiridion
description: The Land of Ooo is underwater, and it’s up to Finn and Jake to find out why. Join our heroes as they explore dangerous waters, search for clues, interrogate pirates and fight bad guys to solve this wet, wet mystery and save the day!

name: The Path of Motus
description: Will you let other people stop you from pursuing your dreams? The Path of Motus is a game where words hurt.... literally.

name: Mugsters
description:
Aliens have taken over the planet and enslaved humanity. Only you have the know-how to drive back the dastardly threat, free your fellow Earthlings and SAVE THE WORLD.

Mugsters is a physics-based, supercharged, action-packed puzzler with sandbox levels where you must outrun, out-manoeuvre and outsmart your enemies by experimenting with different vehicles, environmental traps and explosives.

Mugsters is focused on the players’ creativity. Break out the prisoners, collect the crystals and get the heck out of dodge any way you can!

name: Tempest 4000
description: In Tempest 4000, players are once again in control of the Claw, a powerful spacecraft equipped to destroy deadly creatures and other obstructions with rapid-fire shots on vibrant geometric prisms. With three game modes to choose from and 100 levels to conquer, players must eliminate all enemies as quickly as possible to survive and achieve that coveted spot at the top of the leaderboards.

name: Mothergunship
description: Our mission is clear, our determination strong, and our guns are very, very big. MOTHERGUNSHIP is a bullet-hell FPS hybrid facing you, Earth’s last hope, against the fleets of data-hoarding robotic alien invaders. Take the fight to the enemy, craft gun monstrosities that no reasonable person could ever lift, and experience randomized mayhem as you battle your way to the heart of the fleet to destroy the MOTHERGUNSHIP!

name: Sonic: Battle of Chaos Mugen - The Final Battle
description: This game is a fighting game with elements of Sonic The Hedgehog.

name: Laser Blast! 2: The Fight
description: This sci-fi themed platformer is the sequel to Laser Blast! Play as the advanced robot Atom Girl and progress through a platforming level, defeating enemy forces along the way. Destroy the end boss to complete Atom Girl's mission and buy her time to repair herself so that she can escape the planet Garlock-7, where a hostile force has taken over.

name: Supreme Duelist Stickman
description: Sin descripción

name: Re:in
description: Re:in is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Hanatsuki, a girl who refuses to leave her room, instead choosing to peek outside. Later, you can unlock another character, Tamashitsuki.

name: Dungeons & Lesbians
description: A short visual novel about seducing your best friends over table top role playing games.

name: Wake Up
description: A retro 3d adventure game inspired by Twin Peaks and Resident Evil. This game was made during Castle Game Jam 2018.

name: Beherit
description:
Trapped and alone, you must uncover the truth behind the gemstone known as the Beherit and overcome its nightmare. 
 
It will be no easy task, requiring you to navigate an ever expanding level and solve a wide array of puzzles, all the while being hunted by an advanced AI system.

name: Shi-Ro
description:
"Solve challenging puzzles on a beautiful Japanese lacquer box and engage with stories based in early Japan: In the beginning, so the Kojiki tells, sea was sky and sky was sea.
Journey towards calmness while rotating a lacquer box, puzzle by puzzle, word by word, further in time.

In Shi•Ro you reconcile past and present with empress Gemmei, travel through dark forests to invite spirits to the shrine of old Yoshida, and climb Mount Inari with a fox."

name: Dude Cops
description: Dude Cops is a point 'n' click adventure game that follows the shenanigans of detectives Choco and H.T. Bunz, as they travel around town solving cases.

name: The Night of Fire Stealing
description: The Night of Fire Stealing is a retro wind RPG game made by RPGmaker MV. You're going to play Zhou Shuren in the game. Adventures in Shanghai with two girls who call themselves Nietzsche and Marx.Explore the unknown world full of mythological and philosophical elements.Solving the crisis of the universe.

name: Teddy
description: Teddy keeps you locked in his house. You have 3 days to escape. Be careful, because Teddy can see and hear you. Find objects, remove locks and escape.

name: Beat Rush
description: Dodge the spikes and traps!

name: HyperZen Training
description: Experimental minimalist game with a special graphical mecanic.

name: 10 Seconds
description: Gather your friends and play this party, funny, fast paced game in order to see who is better at throwing stuff, eating, drinking or other common activities when the time is your worst enemy! To complete each task you have a maximum of... yeah... you guessed it... 10 seconds!

name: Lost Lands: Ice Spell
description: Susan is back again in the middle of problems of epic proportions deep in the Lost Lands. Weather cataclysm, mythical creatures, ancient legends - these and more stands before the main hero of the Lost Lands.

name: Hag's Castle
description:
Hag’s Castle is a 3d action adventure game set in the age of Scottish myth and legend, with strange dragons, evil old crones and a cast of crusty creatures from the bog. There is a castle to explore, and monsters to fight and traps to avoid!.
You will explore dark dungeons, foosty wine cellars, opulent gardens and lofty towers, as you attempt a daring rescue and find a way to escape from the clutches of the evil harridan, Madam Hag.
You must swing the legendary Moonsword to defeat enemies, and harness the power of a wizard’s familiar to cast magical spells.
The demonic witchcraft of Madam Hag must be defeated!.

name: Arboreal
description: Arboreal is an open world farming and adventure game where you have to save the world from a spreading corruption.

name: Tribloos 3
description: The Birds Are Coming! They're after the Tribloos and only Trey and the gang can stop them. Return to the world of the Tribloos and join them on a new adventure, chasing their captured friend across the seas, mountains and deserts.

name: Groove Coaster for Steam
description:
Riding the rhythmic rails of success from smart phone, into the arcades, now GROOVE COASTER arrives on Steam!
Are you ready to ride a roller coaster of sound and light through a universe of music?

name: The Life's Lane
description:
Can You Achieve what every Immigrant or Refugee Dreams, by making it to The United States of America ?
Can You Achieve what Everyone Dreams, by making The Big Bucks ?
Experience an Epic Journey taking You from a poor African Country to The USA, where You'll have to Forge Your Own Path to financial success!!! Gain appropriate Work Experience, Improve your Qualifications and make smart Investment decisions. Enjoy the luxuries in life while carefully balancing your budget and time. Can You Achieve the American Dream by retiring rich and early ?

name: CPRC: Extant Hunters
description: Hunt dinosaurs. With friends. CPRC: Extant Hunters is a single player/cooperative multiplayer game that pits players against the most intelligent, formidable, and brutal predators in history.

name: Women's Soccer Manager
description: The new Women’s Soccer Manager platform will make your soccer dreams come true. Become a manager of your favorite soccer club and use your knowledge and tactical skills to build a pro soccer career as a manager in Women’s Soccer Manager.

name: Dungeon Warfare 2
description:
Dungeon Warfare 2 is the definitive sequel to Dungeon Warfare, a challenging tower defense strategy game where you become a dungeon lord to defend your dungeons with the deadliest of traps and insidious contraptions against greedy adventurers and wannabe heroes. 
 
Game Features 
- Physics-enabled tower defense mayhem 
- 33 unique traps with 8 unique traits for each trap 
- More than 30 unique enemies, each with a special trait 
- More than 60 handcrafted levels + an infinite number of procedurally generated dungeons 
- 5+ boss battles 
- Progression with experience providing passive upgrades for the traps as well as skill points 
- Three skill trees with 11 skills on each tree 
- Equipment system with more than 30 unique items 
- Mix your own difficulty by combining difficulty mode runes for more challenge & reward 
- Endless mode 
- Environmental Hazards

name: VR2: Vacate 2 Rooms
description: You need to find a lot of hidden items. Uncover secrets. Use strange mechanisms to proceed through the different rooms to the exit.

name: Snail Racer Extreme
description:
Come play this extremely addictive and fun snail racing game
Snail Racer Extreme

name: Virtual Pirate VR
description:
Shooting & Slice Action 
Position Tracking (Move / Evasion) 
Vs Giant Boss Battle (Kraken) 
2~6P PvP Team Battle

name: Thief of Thieves: Season One
description: Thief of Thieves: Season One is a story of heists and the people behind them. It's time for Celia, protege of master thief Redmond, to make the leap from apprentice to master. A new continent and a new team, will you make the cut?

name: Super Skull Smash GO! 2 Turbo
description: The Kingdom of Bones needs you! Purify the land and stop Evil King once and for all. Take the skull-smashing puzzle platformer in a new direction with TURBO action, TURBO puzzles and TURBO boss battles.

name: Web Spice
description: The planet was attacked by spaceships. This doesn't bode well. Armed with the most powerful weapons on Earth (including cats), you decide to fight back the invaders.

name: Virtual Ninja VR
description: VR Shooting & Slice Action Arcade Game where YOU become Ninja defeats the enemy using a shuriken and a katana and clears to the last stage.

name: Wizard Hunter 2348
description: The epic struggle of bureaucracy versus magic hangs in the balance, and only your effective use of a variety of ambush tactics can save the day. With no more than a small tank armed to the teeth, take on dozens of wizards and several demons at once.

name: Imperatum
description:
You are an agent, thrown headfirst into your first mission trying to unravel the mystery of the veil that is consuming the galaxy.

Created by former professional gamers and AAA developers, Imperatum is an Action RPG set in a future Sci-Fi universe.

The game focuses on the core ARPG 'trinity' mechanics of fast-paced combat, deep character customization and tons of loot!

name: Freeman and Bob
description: Sin descripción

name: SinVR
description: Enter the Forbidden World of SinVR. Fulfill your sexual fantasies in your own private dungeon. With a growing library of characters and environments, SinVR is the destination for amusing adult entertainment, in VR or on your PC.

name: Fredbear and Friends: Left to Rot
description:
With the assistance of a private investigator through your handheld radio, you sneak down into the depths of Fredbear's Family Diner—seeking out clues for the whereabouts of your son and prime suspect of the case, William Afton.

However, unforeseen traps have been set within the facility. Will you be able to escape?

name: Floating Sandbox
description: This game is a realistic two-dimensional particle system, which uses mass-spring networks to simulate rigid bodies (such as ships) floating in water and exchanging heat with their surroundings. You can punch holes in an object, slice it, apply forces and heat to it, set it on fire, and smash it with bomb explosions. Once water starts rushing inside the object, it will start sinking and, if you're lucky enough, it will start breaking up!

name: Touch Melbourne
description: Explore the city of Melbourne through its various, tiny everyday interactions.

name: Yuuto Ichika's One Time Wonder
description: Yuuto Ichika's One Time Wonder is a game jam project featuring a novice magician named Yuuto, who must use objects such as rocks to properly cast spells.

name: Bee Factory!
description: Bee Factory! is an exciting bee idle game. Are you ready to manage your own tycoon factory and become the richest man alive? Unlock over 100 super fun bees, sell tons of honey, upgrade your bees and your machines to make more money, and earn millions and billions while you're offline. Tap to increase your bees productivity.

name: No Response
description:
After a car accident leaves you stranded in the middle of nowhere, you need to find help as soon as possible. Your phone screen broken in the crash, you are unable to call for help - but can read incoming text messages from concerned family and friends as you make your way towards a distant cabin - the only sign of life around... 
From the creators of Causeway, experience a beautiful yet harrowing story of love and loss.

name: Beasts & Chests
description: Find and destroy the magic seals in a big open world, full of pitfalls and face hostile beasts with your powerful magic skills, but stay away from the guardians!

name: Ghostbusters VR: Showdown
description: The next chapter is here. New York is in grave danger in the follow up to Ghostbusters VR! Act 2, Showdown, is a fast paced VR shooter where you’ll use your Ghostbusting skills to fend off a legion of New York’s finest ghouls.

name: Turn Run
description:
Simple ! One Tap ! Addictive !

Turn Run is a simple addictive indie game. Collecting all the asteroids will be your mission impossible !

You will control your rocket with casual one tap button.

This challanging twisted geometry game, is your source of funky casual unlimited (endless) fun !

This game will make you fly into rage because of trippy impossible challanging levels !

Game contains two modes. Normal Mode & Endless Mode !

Select your rocket and mode !

name: Rabbit and the moon
description: Play a classic platformer by Silver Boar Gaming, Rabbit and the moon is a simple platformer where you have to help your rabbit reach the moon. Collect vegetables for points, dodge ice balls, enemy stars and towards the end you will have to jump on asteroid platforms and dodge flying asteroids.

name: Doraemon Step-Up PC
description: Doraemon Step-Up PC is a portable LCD laptop game by Bandai. It is based on the Doraemon series and contains various educational games which teach kids about maths, Japanese, science, among other things.

name: Mermaid Swamp
description: This is a remake of the original game that adds new art, upgraded graphics, Japanese voice acting, reworked puzzles, and various quality of life and gameplay improvements.

name: Pokémon FireRed VR Missions
description: Interested in a new kind of challenge? Rather than a huge adventure through the Pokemon world, VR Missions instead offers a series of specific scenarios in which you must make it to the goal of the level, using only what the level gives you in each stage. There are 30 stages and all, each with a unique gimmick of some kind. If you are familiar with the Battle Sim from Pokemon XD: Gale of Darkness, the idea is similar to that, just with some overworld puzzles in addition to battles.

name: Paper Doll
description: Dress-up game with introspection and lesbians

name: Or8
description: 0r8 (Orb) is a first-person sci-fi puzzle game where you solve puzzles by travelling between dimensions.

name: Solbot Energy Rush
description: Play as a robot and collect renewable energy resources as part of a space mission. Dodge tricky patterns, learn facts about saving energy to help the environment, and use fun power ups!

name: The mutton horn - Jump jump!
description: Overcoming all difficulties, fly only forward! And so that does not happen, do not give up! This is the message of the game: The mutton horn - Jump jump! Jump higher and higher, collecting scattered around the coins. Avoiding obstacles, calculating the further flight trajectory, this is the only way to reach the end.

name: Ninja from Hell vs. Reptiloids
description:
Ninja from Hell vs. Reptiloids - a classic clicker. In which you need to appease the ancient deity to save the world from destruction.
You act as a master of the ninja, who, for the sake of the deity, chops the unfaithful heretics. Collect points, move on, only so, you will save the world from destruction!

name: Amaze'd
description: Amaze'D is a puzzle based path-finding game where an apparently normal puzzle is incorporated into a visually catchy 3D environment with diverse climatic scenarios in vivid and dreamy landscapes in various locations to add an edge over regular games.

name: Quible Sphere
description: Roll through 40 different levels that increase in difficulty, avoiding several obstacles and using powerups in order to get to the end of each level!

name: Bleeding Sun
description: On this Indie RPG with Turn-Based battles you are Yori. After 15 years running, you have finally returned home to face your father’s killer. What choices are you going to make? Are you going to follow the honorable path or are you going to be consumed by revenge?

name: Outside the Lines
description: Outside the Lines is a free top-down shooter where drawing utensils compete to cover a coloring book with their color.

name: Vogue, the Explorer
description:
Join the adventures of Lara into a Vogue strange world. You will need to use 3d platforming skills in order to evade.
You will encounter some weird creatures that will attack you.

name: The Amazing Adventures of Lady Fanny Featherstone
description: Join the Lady Fanny Featherstone on her amazing adventures as she explores a lost island in this retro inspired puzzle platformer.

name: unBorn
description:
Help a lonely spermatozoon survive his ultimate journey, and solve what has been haunting his dreams all his life - what he calls, "The Ovum"! 
Join him on his quest of survival where you will face hordes of ravenous std's, and stare down mega organisms who have never met defeat!

name: Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker
description: Captain Toad stars in his own puzzling quest on the Nintendo Switch system! Our stubby hero must dodge dangers and track treasures across many trap-filled courses. Survive smoldering volcanoes, hazardous steam engines, haunted houses, and even new courses based on the Super Mario Odyssey game! Luckily, a second player can join in by tossing turnips at enemies.

name: Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker
description: Nintendo 3DS port of Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker.

name: Flower Boy Athletic High
description: Flower Boy Athletic High is a mobile game developed by Day7.

name: Pico Pirates
description: Massive open world pirate adventures!

name: 6-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle: Starships
description: Peripheral vision refers to an area in which you can absorb visual information without moving your eyes. During the game you will be shown starships for a short time, and you will have to remember their quantity.

name: 6-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle: Cube Match
description: The game is aimed at training the speed of reaction and thinking. There is a myth that the reaction rate is the same for all, but it is not. You can easily verify this. It is enough to pass the test to determine the speed of reaction with friends or relatives. You will notice that it is different.

name: 6-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle: Lost Starships
description: This game for the development of memory. The aim of the game is to remember the location of the starships and then indicate the missed.

name: Octopath Traveler: Traveler's Compendium Edition
description:
A role-playing game from the Bravely Default team is being developed exclusively for the Nintendo Switch. They have brought a new world to life through a mix of CG, pixel art, and "HD-2D" visuals.

The Traveler's Compendium Edition contains:
Octopath Traveler Game
Double-Sided cloth World Map of Osterra
Replica of a Leaf Coin, the in-game currency
8-Page Pop-up Book with Item Compartments

name: Asonde Igo ga Tsuyoku Naru! Ginsei Igo DX
description: Sin descripción

name: Octopath Traveler: Wayfarer's Edition
description:
A role-playing game from the Bravely Default team is being developed exclusively for the Nintendo Switch. They have brought a new world to life through a mix of CG, pixel art, and "HD-2D" visuals.

The Wayfarer's Edition contains:
Octopath Traveler Game
Octopath Traveler Sound Selections CD
Double-Sided cloth World Map of Osterra
Replica of a Leaf Coin, the in-game currency
8-Page Pop-up Book with Item Compartments

name: Gleam of Fire
description:
Evade all types of attacks and enemies with awesome dash or just combo your way with the sword to find the deepest portal.

One of the coolest bow shooting effects in 2D platform games is at your fingertips! Gravitation changes as you charge arrow in mid-air to aim for that perfect shot through multiple enemies.

name: Falling Blocks
description: Score and survive!

name: Chocolate makes you happy 7
description: Casual colorful physical puzzle with sweets, jumpers, teleports, accelerators, reverse gravity, traps, treadmills, lazors and explosions.

name: Fan'cie Veer! (Fish Are Nasty, Cake Is Excellent Vektor Evading Emblazed Rapture)
description: Frantic action awaits you in this game all about surviving and collecting as many points and cake as you can! "FAN'CIE VEER" is a unique new high octane retro action game that will have you eating fattening cake, moving to slim down and veering to avoid all of the rocks and deadly fish!

name: Fish Catcher
description: "Fish Catcher" is a lovely catching fishes game. Indeed, unlike “Fishing Game” you've played before, the lively fishes will jump up from the sea. There are lovely pink commonfish, haughty yellow goldenfish, of course, there are still the bombfish what you can not catch!!

name: Robots 2 Unknown World
description: You play for the robot Pip, and you need to get out of the planet Narkoland, destroy enemy robots and find your way to Kokostan

name: Kill the Monster
description: Hello everyone, I am BON. I wrote this paragraph with a complicated mood. My father is sick, and needs a lot of money, but I don’t have it. What’s worse is that I recently lost my job. That's my situation, if you are willing to help me out of the woods, please buy a game, thank you very much.

name: UnHolY DisAsTeR
description:
The novice priestess who serves "the Spirit of Aqua”, Clementine fights against so-called
demons with the spirit's blessings in this exploration based side-scrolling action game!

name: Thievery
description: Thievery lets you take control of a thief with a magic knife, which allows him to teleport both himself and his enemies.

name: The Castle Disaster 2
description: Join the power of good! Help the light destroy the evil that conceived to seize power in the kingdom

name: Fancy Skiing 2: Online
description:
The "Fancy Skiing II:Online" is finally coming! An enhanced edition for previous game "Fancy Skiing VR", with two new modes-- "platform jumping" mode && multi-player mode added. 
New skateboards and snow shoes are available on shop, bringing brand new experiences.

name: Yahrit!
description: Easy to learn and fast to play party brawler with sweet pixel art.

name: Russia Battlegrounds
description: Russia Battlegrounds - a multiplayer Battle Royale shooter, in which 32 unarmed players are fighting for their lives. Only your aggression and cruelty will help you survive in this bloody bath. Welcome to Mother Russia.

name: Trek: Travel Around the World
description: In Trek: Travel Around the World, the adventure starts in your new Helsinki apartment. Each experience after that transports you to a new destination where real-world locations are blended with magical phenomenon: Catching fishes in the Archipelago in order to fill the sky with the majestic Northern Lights, powering the city of Helsinki as a giant in the capital of Finland, and tracing the stars to highlight the constellations in the sky.

name: Rolling in the Reef
description: Rolling in the Reef is a dice-driven strategy game about guiding your fishy friends to thrive in their coral home. Dive beneath the waves to build big fish combos, collect valuable artifacts and unlock wild new schools of fish.

name: Coach Bus Simulator Parking
description: Are you ready to drive coach bus on bumpy roads? Play the most realistic Coach bus simulator game. Drive carefully by avoid the accident and show your Coach bus driving skills.

name: VideoGame Construction Set
description: Do you want to : Create your game and feel the pleasure of building your universe ? Learn to code - definitely a smart investment for the coming years ? Play or even better, challenge your friends? So welcome! VGCS opens all these doors. In front of you, the ocean of possibilities...

name: Deep Noise
description: Deep Noise is a top down survival horror game off a submersible sonar. A crew exploring Europa went missing and your vessel stopped working. You must find power, air, and the messages in the depths of Europa.

name: Bring to Light
description: Trapped in the city subway system due to a sudden disaster, you explore the depths of the tunnels to find your way out. The further you explore, the more you realize there is more to this disaster...and the lurking shadows are following your every move.

name: Ecchi Cards
description: This game is a casual Cards game where you battle your cards against opponent's deck.

name: MiniCar Race
description:
Little Cars, BIG Fun! Start your engines! The most vibrant, super racing game you’ve ever seen is here! 
Unlock all kinds of fun cars! Challenge multiple race tracks, multiple racing modes!

name: Yeli Orog
description:
Yeli Orog is a FMV adventure game about an immense archaeological discovery: A bizarre stone tablet written in the Celtiberian language found buried underneath an ancient dolmen in northern Spain. The inscription written on the tablet tells a ghoulish tale believed to be the Celtiberian origin myth.

You play the role of Johnny Robin, an archaeologist sent to Asturias, Spain to assist in the recovery of Celtiberian remains. Upon arrival to Asturias you find yourself unexpectedly transported to an alien world, experiencing first-hand the terrifying story written on the ancient tablet.

If you are a fan of Myst-like games, interactive stories with puzzle elements, and FMV games, you will appreciate Yeli Orog.

name: Mars or Die!
description: Control two characters simultaneously! Survive, gather, collect upgrades, fight all sizes of one-eyed Martians, build defensible outposts and conquer Mars, in this glorious mix between roguelite and tower defense.

name: Immortals
description:
《Immortals》 is a SLG with fast paced fighting.
When the game starts, the hero will appear in a huge maze, and your goal is to find a way out of the maze.
The hero will encounter other characters in the maze. They may be enemies or friends. You need to be careful in making judgments.
You need to collect materials, make magic weapons, learn skills and fight in this maze to find a way out of the maze.

name: Geometry Rush
description: It is a game for hardcore players where you have to flip, spin and dodge to achieve the highest score possible.

name: Gaze At Maze
description: Gaze At Maze is a 2D top-down Maze game based on the story of a weird maze world which is full of weird looking creatures, powerful bots guarding the human embryos against intruders.

name: Rush
description:
Are you ready for the ultimate thrill ride?

Take a dive into the adrenaline-pumping world of wingsuit flying with RUSH! Soar down mountainsides at breakneck speeds. Weave through canyons, dodge outcrops, and plummet down sheer drops as you race towards the finish line.

Do you have what it takes to walk a tightrope at near terminal velocity?

Strap on your Rift and hold on tight; you're in for a Rush!

name: MineSweep
description: Become an expert in mine clearance! MineSweep is a puzzle game whose goal is to locate hidden mines in a virtual field with the only indication of the number of mines in adjacent areas.

name: Crooked Waters
description: Crooked Waters is a multiplayer virtual reality game where you and your pirate crew participate in thrilling sea battles. Play with random players or join up with your friends to fight other crews using your ship.

name: 6-in-1 IQ Scale Bundle
description: We transform science into delightful gamesFor decades, researchers have created tasks that measure cognitive abilities. We’ve adapted some of these tasks and made some of our own, creating cognitive games. It makes you smarter!

name: All-Star Fruit Racing
description: All-Star Fruit Racing is the kart racing game you’ve been waiting for! Easy to learn but hard to master, choose your character, customize your kart and play the way that tempts you most!
